original_text: You must keep safe a tenth part of all the crops that grow in your fields. You must be careful to do this every year.
korean_text: 너는 마땅히 매 년 토지 소산의 십일조를 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: You must keep safe a tenth part of all the crops
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 모든 곡물의 십분의 일을 안전하게 보관해야 한다

sentences.original_text: You must be careful to do this
